keyMoments.title: Final Battle Against Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: The Black Cat Pirates' plan reaches its climax as Captain Kuro battles Luffy, Buchi fights Zoro, and Jango pursues Kaya.
keyMoments.significance: This represents the culmination of the Black Cat Pirates' three-year scheme and their ultimate confrontation with the Straw Hat crew.

goals: Execute Kuro's retirement plan by stealing Kaya's fortune

reveals.information: The crew's ultimate goal is revealed to be facilitating Kuro's retirement by helping him fake his death and steal Kaya's inheritance
